item.description: Libraries # Currently there are multiple libraries planned to be integrated deeply into linux: Gtk , WebkitGTK , libshumate libadwaita , GIO , gstreamer . GTK # Gtk is the toolkit which is used to display windows and widgets on the screen. The widgets can be added directly in code or described through an xml file. Supported widgets are for example: Windows, dialogs, labels, images, spinner, progressbars, several buttons and switches, textboxes, tables, lists, menus, toolbars, popovers, and much more.
